plugins.title: TwitchTV
plugins.synopsis: Twitch.TV: Game streaming.
plugins.description: Twitch is the world's leading video platform and community for gamers. More than 45 million gamers gather every month on Twitch to broadcast, watch and chat about gaming. Twitch's video platform is the backbone of both live and on-demand distribution for the entire video game ecosystem. This includes game publishers, developers, media outlets, industry conventions and press conferences, casual gamers and gaming for charity events. Twitch also caters to the entire esports industry, spanning the top pro players, tournaments, leagues, talk shows and organizations. Learn more at http://twitch.tv

plugins.title: Tou.tv
plugins.synopsis: Showtime plugin to watch RadioCanada's Tou.tv shows
plugins.description:
Tou.tv Showtime plugin is the integration of the website tou.tv into Showtime

Most of the content is in french and only accessible from Canada (ip address restriction).

That said, some 'webseries' such as Dakodak or J'adopte un pays, and some other documentaries such as Villages en France can be played from any country (I would say 15% of the shows can be played from outside Canada) - choose "Accessible Hors Canada" if you live outside Canada.

plugins.author: lprot
plugins.title: TED Talks
plugins.synopsis: Here you will find the best talks and performances from TED conferences.
plugins.description:
TED Talks began as a simple attempt to share what happens at TED with the world. Under the moniker ideas worth spreading, talks were released online. They rapidly attracted a global audience in the millions. Indeed, the reaction was so enthusiastic that the entire TED website has been reengineered around TED Talks, with the goal of giving everyone on-demand access to the world's most inspiring voices.

Learn more on http://www.ted.com

plugins.author: sn0b
plugins.title: ownCloud/WebDAV
plugins.synopsis: Allows to play media files via WebDAV, for instance, from ownCloud or NextCloud
plugins.description:
This plugin makes it possible to browse and play/view video, audio and image files from ownCloud, NextCloud or other WebDAV compatible services.

Supported video mimetypes: video/ogg, video/3gpp, video/x-ms-asf, video/x-msvideo, video/avi, video/mpeg, video/quicktime, video/vnd.rn-realvideo, video/mp4, video/x-flv, video/webm, video/x-matroska, video/dvd

Supported audio mimetypes: audio/ogg, audio/mpeg, audio/mpeg3, audio/x-pn-realaudio, audio/wav

Supported image mimetypes: image/png, image/jpeg, image/gif, image/bmp, image/tiff

Custom video, audio or image mimetypes can be added in the settings.
